sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';

import {
    LineChart, 
    Bar, 
    XAxis, 
    YAxis, 
    Cell, 
    Line,
    CartesianGrid, 
    Tooltip, 
    Legend,
    ResponsiveContainer,
} from 'recharts'; 

import { Panel } from 'react-bootstrap';

const data = [
    {name: 'Page A', uv: 4000, pv: 2400, amt: 2400},
    {name: 'Page B', uv: 3000, pv: 1398, amt: 2210},
    {name: 'Page C', uv: 2000, pv: 9800, amt: 2290},
    {name: 'Page D', uv: 2780, pv: 3908, amt: 2000},
    {name: 'Page E', uv: 1890, pv: 4800, amt: 2181},
    {name: 'Page F', uv: 2390, pv: 3800, amt: 2500},
    {name: 'Page G', uv: 3490, pv: 4300, amt: 2100},
];

const d = [
    {Date: "3/2019", Sales: 2, Profit: 2},
    {Date: "2/2019", Sales: 6, Profit: 6},
    {Date: "1/2019", Sales: 0, Profit: 0},
    {Date: "12/2018", Sales: 0, Profit: 0},
    {Date: "11/2018", Sales: 0, Profit: 0},
    {Date: "10/2018", Sales: 0, Profit: 0},
    {Date: "9/2018", Sales: 0, Profit: 0},
    {Date: "8/2018", Sales: 0, Profit: 0},
    {Date: "7/2018", Sales: 0, Profit: 0},
    {Date: "6/2018", Sales: 0, Profit: 0},
    {Date: "5/2018", Sales: 0, Profit: 0},
    {Date: "4/2018", Sales: 0, Profit: 0},
    {Date: "3/2018", Sales: 0, Profit: 0}
]

const lineChart = (props) => {
    console.log(props.data);
    return (
        <Panel>
            <ResponsiveContainer width="98.5%" height={300}>
                <LineChart width={props.width} height={props.height} data={d}
                    margin={{top: 5, right: 30, left: 20, bottom: 5}}>
                    <XAxis dataKey="Date"/>
                    <XAxis dataKey="Date"/>
                    <YAxis/>
                    <Tooltip/>
                    <Legend />
                    <Line type="monotone" dataKey="Sales" stroke="#8884d8" activeDot={{r: 8}}/>
                    <Line type="monotone" dataKey="Profit" stroke="#82ca9d" />
                </LineChart>
            </ResponsiveContainer>
        </Panel>
    )
}

export default lineChart;
